name: Bluetooth
description: The Bluetooth interface of the Web Bluetooth API returns a Promise to a BluetoothDevice object with the specified options.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The Bluetooth interface of the Web Bluetooth API returns a Promise to a BluetoothDevice object with the specified options.
